templates.template: <${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/checkbox" fieldDescription="${FIELD_DESCRIPTION}" name="./${NODE_NAME}" text="${FIELD_TEXT}" value="true" /> <${NODE_NAME}-value-when-missing jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/hidden" name="./${NODE_NAME}@UseDefaultWhenMissing" value="{Boolean}true" /> <${NODE_NAME}-value-default jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/hidden" name="./${NODE_NAME}@DefaultValue" value="{Boolean}false" />

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <jcr:root xmlns:cq="http://www.day.com/jcr/cq/1.0" xmlns:jcr="http://www.jcp.org/jcr/1.0" cq:isContainer="{Boolean}${false}" jcr:primaryType="cq:Component" jcr:title="${COMPONENT_TITLE}" componentGroup="${COMPONENT_GROUP}" />

<${TAB_NODE} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" jcr:title="${TAB_NAME}" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/fixedcolumns" /> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <column jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> ${cursor} </items> </column> </items> </${TAB_NODE}>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <jcr:root xmlns:sling="http://sling.apache.org/jcr/sling/1.0" xmlns:cq="http://www.day.com/jcr/cq/1.0" xmlns:jcr="http://www.jcp.org/jcr/1.0" xmlns:nt="http://www.jcp.org/jcr/nt/1.0" jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" jcr:title="${COMPONENT_NAME}" sling:resourceType="cq/gui/components/authoring/dialog"> <content jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/tabs" type="nav" /> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <${TAB_NODE} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" jcr:title="${TAB_NAME}" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/fixedcolumns" /> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <column jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> ${cursor} </items> </column> </items> </${TAB_NODE}> </items> </content> </jcr:root>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <jcr:root xmlns:sling="http://sling.apache.org/jcr/sling/1.0" xmlns:cq="http://www.day.com/jcr/cq/1.0" xmlns:jcr="http://www.jcp.org/jcr/1.0" xmlns:nt="http://www.jcp.org/jcr/nt/1.0" jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" jcr:title="${COMPONENT_NAME}" sling:resourceType="cq/gui/components/authoring/dialog"> <content jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/fixedcolumns" /> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <column jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> ${cursor} </items> </column> </items> </content> </jcr:root>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <jcr:root xmlns:cq="http://www.day.com/jcr/cq/1.0" xmlns:jcr="http://www.jcp.org/jcr/1.0" cq:dialogMode="floating" jcr:primaryType="cq:EditConfig"> <cq:listeners jcr:primaryType="cq:EditListenersConfig" afterdelete="${REFRESH_PARENT}" aftermove="${REFRESH_PAGE}" afteredit="${REFRESH_SELF}" afterinsert="${REFRESH_PARENT}"/> </jcr:root>

<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" jcr:title="${FIELD_LABEL}" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/fieldset"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/fixedcolumns"/> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> ${cursor} </items> </${NODE_NAME}>

<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" jcr:title="${FIELD_LABEL}" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/fieldset"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/fixedcolumns"/> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <column jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <well jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/well"/> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> ${cursor} </items> </well> </items> </column> </items> </${NODE_NAME}>

<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/fileupload" autoStart="{Boolean}false" class="cq-droptarget" fieldLabel="${FIELD_LABEL}" fileNameParameter="./${NODE_NAME}/fileName" mimeTypes="[image]" multiple="{Boolean}${false}" name="./${NODE_NAME}/file" uploadUrl="$${suffix.path}" title="${FIELD_LABEL}" useHTML5="{Boolean}${true}" />
<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/include" path="${PATH_TO_INCLUDE}" />

<${NODE_NAME}
    jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"
    sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/multifield"
    class="multifield-full-width">
    ${cursor}
</${NODE_NAME}>

<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/numberfield" defaultValue="${DEFAULT}" fieldDescription="${FIELD_DESCRIPTION}" fieldLabel="${FIELD_LABEL}" max="${MAX}" min="${MIN}" name="./${NODE_NAME}"/>

<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/numberfield" defaultValue="${DEFAULT}" fieldDescription="${FIELD_DESCRIPTION}" fieldLabel="${FIELD_LABEL}" max="${MAX}" min="${MIN}" name="./${NODE_NAME}" step="${PRECISION}"/>

<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/pathbrowser" fieldDescription="${FIELD_DESCRIPTION}" fieldLabel="${FIELD_LABEL}" name="./${NODE_NAME}" rootPath="/content${ROOT_PATH}"/>

<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/radiogroup" defaultValue="${DEFAULT_VALUE}" name="./${NODE_NAME}" text="${FIELD_TEXT}" > <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <${FIRST_OPTION} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/radio" text="${FIRST_OPTION_TEXT}" value="${FIRST_OPTION}" /> <${SECOND_OPTION} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/radio" text="${SECOND_OPTION_TEXT}" value="${SECOND_OPTION}" /> </items> </${NODE_NAME}>
<${OPTION} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/radio" text="${OPTION_TEXT}" value="${OPTION}" />

<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="cq/gui/components/authoring/dialog/richtext" fieldDescription="${FIELD_DESCRIPTION}" fieldLabel="${FIELD_LABEL}" name="./${NODE_NAME}" useFixedInlineToolbar="{Boolean}true" />

<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/select" fieldDescription="${FIELD_DESCRIPTION}" fieldLabel="${FIELD_LABEL}" name="./${NODE_NAME}"> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <${FIRST_OPTION_NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" selected="{Boolean}true" text="${FIRST_OPTION_TEXT}" value="${FIRST_OPTION_NODE_NAME}" /> <${SECOND_OPTION_NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" text="${SECOND_OPTION_TEXT}" value="${SECOND_OPTION_NODE_NAME}" /> </items> </${NODE_NAME}>
<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" text="${OPTION_TEXT}" value="${NODE_NAME}" />
<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/text" text="${FIELD_TEXT}"/>

<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/textarea" fieldDescription="${FIELD_DESCRIPTION}" fieldLabel="${FIELD_LABEL}" name="./${NODE_NAME}"/>

<${NODE_NAME} jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/textfield" fieldDescription="${FIELD_DESCRIPTION}" fieldLabel="${FIELD_LABEL}" name="./${NODE_NAME}" />
